CustomField.description: AJWS has awarded NUMBER grants totaling $AMOUNT
CustomField.formula: "AJWS has awarded " & TEXT(of_Grants_Awarded_to_Grantee__c) & " grants totaling $" & IF( Sum_of_All_Grants_Awarded_to_Grantee__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Sum_of_All_Grants_Awarded_to_Grantee__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Sum_of_All_Grants_Awarded_to_Grantee__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Sum_of_All_Grants_Awarded_to_Grantee__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Sum_of_All_Grants_Awarded_to_Grantee__c)), 3)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: AJWS has awarded NUMBER grants totaling $AMOUNT
CustomField.label: AJWS Funding History
